Text:
A mistake was made

Apparently this is really S03E01. While I Was Murdered is new, apparently it's the ID show 'Stolen Voices, Buried Secrets' under a different name. Now it goes by the name I Was Murdered as of its third season.

It's still the right episode though.

Thank you for the upload, really love this show ! Please upload episode 2 " Newlywed Nightmare" 
Thanks again ... ;))
